content: -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- **swatchtastic** - by tin can knits ============ -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- ***i love making swatches you may not feel the same but with this quick and easy pattern you can create a nice tidy stack all while testing out the yarn for your project at the end of the year you will be ready to make a pretty garland of swatch bunting to decorate your craft room child s room or to have on hand for parties *** -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- **swatchtastic is the free pattern from our book mad colour you can check out all of the fab and fun designs here 1 ** -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- **like our knits ** get our email updates 2 to hear about new designs tutorials and subscriber-only special offers -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- **pattern info** **sizing** your finished size may vary but for useful data about finished gauge follow the pattern to make triangles that measure 7-8 across the top **yarn** any yarn these swatches are designed to try out new yarns and colour combinations **needles** any needles you may find you need to try a few different needle sizes before you achieve the pattern gauge **gauge** aim to achieve pattern gauge **notions** darning needle crochet hook if desired for attaching bunting together --------------------------------------------- --------------------------------------------- for all pattern abbreviations techniques and to contact us visit www tincanknits com 3 --------------------------------------------- --------------------------------------------- 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/mad-colour/patterns 2 http //eepurl com/k5p8l 3 http //www tincanknits com
